API Reference

This page contains the API reference for public objects and function within TrustyAI. See the (example notebooks) for usage guides and tutorials.

trustyai

trustyai.init(*args[, path])

Initialize the Java bindings.

trustyai.model

Feature and Output Objects

feature(name, dtype[, value, domain])

Helper method to build features

feature_domain(values)

Create Java FeatureDomain from a Python tuple or list

output(name, dtype[, value, score])

Helper method returning a Java Output

Data Objects

simple_prediction(input_features, outputs)

Wrap features and outputs into a SimplePrediction.

counterfactual_prediction(input_features, ...)

Wrap features and outputs into a CounterfactualPrediction.

Dataset()

Wrapper class for TrustyAI Datasets

Model Classes

Model(predict_fun)

Wrapper for any predictive function.

ArrowModel(pandas_predict_fun)

Wrapper for any predictive function, optimized for Python-Java communication.

trustyai.explainers

CounterfactualExplainer([steps])

"How do I get the result I want?"

CounterfactualResult(result)

Wraps Counterfactual results.

LimeExplainer([perturbations, seed, ...])

"Which features were most important to the results?"

LimeResults(saliencies)

Wraps LIME results.

SHAPExplainer(background[, samples, ...])

"By how much did each feature contribute to the outputs?"

SHAPResults(shap_results, background)

Wraps SHAP results.
